name: South Bay Synergy/Strava Discord Integration
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Built a Discord bot to track Strava activities and statistics for South Bay Synergy, a dragon boat club of 30+ members. Deployed a website for users to view Strava activities, leaderboards, and profiles; deployed a backend to integrate with Strava API.

name: Wordie
summary: Developed a web game where players guess the daily randomly generated six letter word.
